name: The Anglerfish Project
storyline: Drifting through the lonely abyss of space, Pádraig must use his lifetime of experience of fishing the earthen oceans to help The Foundation catch and decipher communication packages that conceal themselves in the cosmos. "We help the people" is their motto, but is that their goal? Thankfully Pádraig has someone he can talk to — a makeshift decoding probe called Paul.
summary: Use your friendly probe, Paul, to fish for communication packages in the cosmos. Aim at an alteration in the sky and, being careful of your strength, cast your fishing rod. You will need to decrypt these hidden messages to help keep everyone safe. Good luck, angler.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: The Anglerfish Project - Catch and decipher communication packages in the cosmos!
